participant_1.background:
My career in party planning is going well, but I'm a bit lonely since I spent my birthday alone.
I collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood.
I spend my weekends learning about the universe.
I was able to design a video game that my father could play and enjoy.
Every day is a sweet taco-filled adventure.

participant_2.background:
I value my privacy most of all.
i am a professional skittles player.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i can speak four languages fluently.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I just wrapped up a big project for my party planning business and I'm feeling really accomplished.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that you're doing well. What kind of party planning do you do?
I do all sorts of parties, from birthday parties to corporate events. I really enjoy it because I get to be creative and help people celebrate special occasions.
That sounds like a really fun job! I'm sure it's rewarding to see people happy and enjoying themselves.
It is! I love being able to make a difference in people's lives.
That's great! What was your favorite party that you've planned?

That's a tough question! I've had so many great experiences. But I think my favorite party was a surprise birthday party I planned for my husband. He was so surprised and happy, and it was so much fun to see him enjoy himself.
That sounds like an amazing party! I'm sure your husband was really grateful.
He was! He said it was the best birthday he's ever had.
That's so great! I'm glad you were able to make him so happy.
Me too! It was really special.
It sounds like you have a really great job.
